thread.title: Alton Sellars

author: Alton Sellars
title: Alton Sellars
text:
I cannot express it anymore how awesome CarID products, prices and service is. I received my Car Amplifier, my recent purchase much earlier than expected and at a price hat no one else could rivaled. Their prices on certain products are the best for their quality items that I've found while shopping around.
Thanks again so very much CarID for your excellent Service and overall awesomeness.
